name: Adventure Trip: Amazing World 2 Collector's Edition
name_original: Adventure Trip: Amazing World 2 Collector's Edition
description:
Let’s continue to be amazed by the Natural and Man Made Wonders of the World… from the glaciers of Alaska to the vast and magnificent Sahara Desert, from the classic Sydney Opera House to the artistically granite carvings of Mount Rushmore. We've combined all wonders together in 34 locations, providing you with an experience of awe and fascination. Let the facts from each location enlighten and guide you through the journey.

As the game unfolds, you are presented with 7 mini puzzles with lots of levels which will add to the fun and give you a little break from fact-finding.

• 60 amazing facts to find
• Explore 34 locations of The World
• Collect 15 unique items for your treasure
• 5 Modes – Word, Silhouette, Scrambled Word, Missing Vowels, Finding Pairs
